{{cpp/experimental/shared_ptr/title | get}}
{{cpp/experimental/shared_ptr/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=libfund_ts |
element_type* get() const noexcept;
}}

Returns the stored pointer.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The stored pointer.

===Notes===
A {{tt|shared_ptr}} may share ownership of an object while storing a pointer to another object. {{tt|get()}} returns the stored pointer, not the managed pointer.
